website_summaries.verdict: A good primer for those with oily skin that is also sensitive to other oil-free products.
pros: Vegan formula that is designed to last up to 12 hours
Helps minimize the look of pores and creates an even surface on your skin
Controls oil without irritating sensitive skin and provides a matte finish
cons: Has a thick consistency and doesn't always keep a matte finish for a full 12 hours

website_summaries.verdict: The perfect choice to keep foundation in place, even on oily skin.
pros: Primer’s matte finish helps elevate the look of your foundation and keeps it in place for hours
Product helps to minimize the look of pores and fine lines
Fine-tip dispenser is perfect for giving you as little or as much product as you want
cons: Thick consistency can be hard to get used to
Remember, a little product goes a long way

customer_reviews.title: I’d order again ♥️
customer_reviews.text: I love it for a matte look. I ordered it Bc I had a bad rash on my face and wanted something that would help my foundation to cover up the bumps. I tried several different primers and this one was by far the best one. It does go on pretty thick so you do use a lot of product. And I would highly recommend you use a good setting spray after you are finished applying your makeup. All in all I love this product. It definitely did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany johnson

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Game changer for incredibly sensitive and oily skin! First primer I have ever tried that worked wonders- absolutely worth the price, and a little bit goes a long way. Order arrived promptly and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Primer Came Out of the Top
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, but the packaging malfunctioned and the primer oozed from the very top right hand corner of the bottle when squeezed. Wasted half of the product- be careful when putting it on your hand that it might come out of the top!
customer_reviews.author: McKennaGazzier

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: covers great and such a little on your fingertip covers beautifully. silky smooth Love it!
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: liked that this was a tad cheaper than other primers, it works ok, it does soften the look of your pores
customer_reviews.author: Anna Vernotzy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Major disappointment.... very greasy .... doesn’t do anything for me
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Langley

customer_reviews.title: Good primer
customer_reviews.text: Have used this primer for awhile now. I like the way it feels and doesn’t make my skin sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan but love the foundation
customer_reviews.text: Returned item didnt provide the primer I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be the real thing?
customer_reviews.text: Greasy watery consistency and didn’t dry. Glad I tried on my hand and not my face.
customer_reviews.author: KBW

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love love love poreless
customer_reviews.text: love this product does wonders for my oily skin and makes my make up wotk so much better absolutely love it and all ingredients are clean ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: mark k

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I liked this primer! It was certified by the EWG, which is what I like most about it. It was a little thick/heavy though, so i’m not sure I’ll order again.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Waitt

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Dry or set up
customer_reviews.text: It goes on very nicely but I'm used to primers that set and then I put on foundation with no issues. With this it doesn't matter how long I wait for it to set because it never does. When I put on my liquid foundation, it slides all over the place because this stuff is underneath and the foundation pulls the primer away with it. My face does stay somewhat shine free but as a primer it doesn't work all that well.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: No more big pores
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Best I have ever used and I've used expensive products in the past. Lasts all day. I blend it in with my full coverage makeup and apply smooth.
customer_reviews.author: tiptop-today

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice and smells good.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased at Ulta but it is top notch stuff. Just wish it was less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Causes blemishes
customer_reviews.text: This primer looks good when you put it on. However, I have zero problems with acne/blemishes and every time I use it my face breaks out with pimples. I used it a week ago and I have about 5 blemishes that are on my cheeks that take forever to clear up. My skin is a bit sensitive and on the dry side so sometimes I have trouble with products irritating my skin but never with blemishes like this stuff causes. I gave it away as I cannot use it.
customer_reviews.author: DarcyDoo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and performance
customer_reviews.text: I love Tarte products. This Primer is excellent, goes on light and smooth. Leaves your skin soft and ready to apply any kind of foundation. It does an excellent job. Worth the money. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

product_meta.title: tarte Poreless Mattifying Primer 30 mL
feature_bullets: Tubo come with factory seal from manufacture.
